import type { Assign } from '@ark-ui/vue'
import { NumberInput } from '@ark-ui/vue/number-input'
import { numberInput } from 'styled-system/recipes'
import type { HTMLStyledProps } from 'styled-system/types'
import type { Component } from 'vue'
import { createStyleContext } from '~/lib/create-style-context'

const { withProvider, withContext } = createStyleContext(numberInput)

export type RootProviderProps = Component<typeof RootProvider>
export const RootProvider = withProvider<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, NumberInput.RootProviderBaseProps>
>(NumberInput.RootProvider, 'root')

export type RootProps = Component<typeof Root>
export const Root = withProvider<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, NumberInput.RootBaseProps>>(
  NumberInput.Root,
  'root',
)

export type ControlProps = Component<typeof Control>
export const Control = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, NumberInput.ControlBaseProps>>(
  NumberInput.Control,
  'control',
)

export type DecrementTriggerProps = Component<typeof DecrementTrigger>
export const DecrementTrigger = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, NumberInput.DecrementTriggerBaseProps>
>(NumberInput.DecrementTrigger, 'decrementTrigger')

export type IncrementTriggerProps = Component<typeof IncrementTrigger>
export const IncrementTrigger = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, NumberInput.IncrementTriggerBaseProps>
>(NumberInput.IncrementTrigger, 'incrementTrigger')

export type InputProps = Component<typeof Input>
export const Input = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'input'>, NumberInput.InputBaseProps>>(
  NumberInput.Input,
  'input',
)

export type LabelProps = Component<typeof Label>
export const Label = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'label'>, NumberInput.LabelBaseProps>>(
  NumberInput.Label,
  'label',
)

export type ScrubberProps = Component<typeof Scrubber>
export const Scrubber = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, NumberInput.ScrubberBaseProps>>(
  NumberInput.Scrubber,
  'scrubber',
)

export {
  NumberInputContext as Context,
  type NumberInputContextProps as ContextProps,
} from '@ark-ui/vue/number-input'
